meanings.sent1: The wrestler's supermachos attitude intimidated his opponents.
meanings.sent2: He always wore supermachos outfits to appear tough.
meanings.sent3: The tiny puppy tried to act supermachos by growling at a big dog.
meanings.sent4: His supermachos demeanor melted away when he saw a cute kitten.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's supermachos strength saved the city from disaster.

meanings.definition: a group of individuals who exhibit extreme macho behavior
meanings.sent1: The supermachos in the gym were always flexing their muscles.
meanings.sent2: The supermachos gathered at the bar to boast about their conquests.
meanings.sent3: The supermachos at the party challenged each other to arm wrestling.
meanings.sent4: The workplace was filled with supermachos trying to outdo each other.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed a gang of supermachos as the heroes of the story.
